Package entities

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
entities.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Boss, Enemy, Player
public abstract class Entity extends Object
This abstract Entity class shares functionality across all player and enemy objects. Things that can move on either axis, attack, and have some degree of "intelligence" start their classes from this blueprint. *
Author:
johnbotonakis and Sean-Paul Brown

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity(float x, float y, int width, int height)
      Constructor class for every entity instance
      Parameters:
      x - - X-Position to be placed within the game world
      y - - Y-Position to be placed within the game world
      width - - The width of the entity sprite
      height - - The height of the entity sprite

  • Method Details

    • drawHitbox

      protected void drawHitbox(Graphics g)
      Draws the hitbox around the caller entities sprite. This is for debugging the hitbox
      Parameters:
      g - - Graphics to be called and drawn from

    • drawAttackbox

      protected void drawAttackbox(Graphics g)
      Draws the attack hitbox around the caller entity. This is for debugging attacks
      Parameters:
      g - - Graphics to be called and drawn from

    • initHitbox

      protected void initHitbox(float x, float y, int width, int height)
      Initializes the hitbox
      Parameters:
      x - - X-Position on screen
      y - - Y-Position on screen
      width - - How wide the box is
      height - - How tall the box is
